title: Shilpa Shetty Kundra Encourages Women to be Financially Independent by Associating with Best Deal TV's Latest Proposition
text:
Friday, October 16, 2015 5:56PM IST (12:26PM GMT) Shilpa Shetty Kundra Encourages Women to be Financially Independent by Associating with Best Deal TV's Latest Proposition Mumbai, Maharashtra, India 
After achieving roaring success with her latest venture Best Deal TV- India’s first ever celebrity driven home shopping channel, Shilpa Shetty Kundra yet again proposes a business venture to give back to the society and empower women. The latest initiative of women empowerment initiative in association with the channel, allows women to get an avenue to showcase their entrepreneurial skills. Keeping in mind, the growing response to home shopping in today’s fast moving world. The initiative invites women aspiring to be financially independent to enroll in their Direct Channel Agents Program. An aspiring entrant will be required to invest a minimum of Rs. 10000 and will be provided the catalogues and demo videos. On the launch of this initiative Shilpa Shetty Kundra, Chairperson- Best Deal TV stated “It gives me immense pleasure in announcing the launch of the Direct Channel Agents Program with Best Deal TV. The initiative aims to encourage today’s Indian women who are independent and self-sufficient to work at their own convenience without the need to be tied down to an organization. Women enrolling in this program can easily earn upto Rs. 10 lac per annum with just an investment of Rs. 10,000 and without the pressures of an organization.” About Best Deal TV Founded by Bollywood Superstar Akshay Kumar & Raj Kundra Best Deal TV™ is a novel concept and is India’s first celebrity-driven 24/7 home shopping channel. The success of this channel is in the unique business model, which combines focused multi-channel sales with integrated marketing, media and distribution through the power of well-known Indian celebrities. Best Deal TV specializes in sourcing quality products with categories like Home, Fashion and Lifestyle and pairing them with celebrities who will promote them direct to the consumers via the 24/7 channel.
